feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Need to access Custom Business Object ODATA V2 API without Edm.Guid - Public Cloud
entry.content: I've created a Custom Business Object and successfully exposed its backend service. While attempting to perform update operations using the key field I defined during creation (e.g., SalesOrderNumber), I noticed that the OData service is still expecting an Edm.Guid as the key. Is there a way to configure the OData service so that it uses my custom key field instead of the system-generated GUID for CRUD operations?

entry.title: How to change the name of a standard field in the purchase requisition with its translation ?
entry.content:
Hello,

We have a very specific business need, in the fiori tile "Manage purchase requisitions" the client wants to change the name of a standard field in the first page of the purchase requisitions, we did this using the "Adapt UI" feature, the problem is with the translation, the client wants to change that field only for the french users, those who connect using any other language should still see the standard name in SAP,

As shown in this screenshot the name was indeed changed in french, the problem is that if you connect in english you'd still see that name in french : 

We do understand that in order to keep the original name in other languages we would need to maintain it using the Fiori Tile "Maintain Translations"

The problem is that after creating the translation in that Tile and downloading the XLF file, translating it and uploading it to SAP, it does not change after publishing.

If anyone have an idea on the source of the problem or if i am doing something wrong please let me know.

 

Thanks in advance.

entry.title: Product Hierarchy Replication ECC - S/4HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hi all,

we are implementing a 2-tier approach for our customer and would like to replicate the product hierarchy from the ECC system (future S4HANA Private Cloud) to the S4HANA Public Cloud system.

We have two APIs that we can use for the Public Cloud (ODataV4 - "Product Hierarchy Nodes - Read, Create" and "Products to Product Hierarchies Assignment - Read, Create"), but the maintenance and structure of the product hierarchy between ECC and the public cloud are different.

Since there is a standard flow that can be used for a connected CRM system, I would like to ask if there is such a standard flow for the replication between ECC or S/4HANA and S/4HANA Public Cloud. 

Thanks in advance!

Best regards 
Katja

entry.title: SAP S4/hana public cloud RAP to SAP build automation workflow
entry.content:
Hi Guys, We‚Äôre currently working with the Budget Approval Template Workflow Budget Approval and its working from sample app on BTP.

At this moment we are developing Custom RAP on S4/hana Cloud abap stack, that will need to create this Workflow(  im following 
https://developers.sap.com/tutorials/abap-environment-sbpa-workflow-integration..html and 

https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-blog-posts-by-sap/integrate-sap-build-process-automation-with-custom-business-object-from-s/ba-p/13918965

I have the RAP running, and the method to trigger the workflow is implemented 

   TRY.
             MODIFY ENTITIES OF i_cpwf_inst
                ENTITY CPWFInstance "Changed#RD
                EXECUTE registerWorkflowStart
                FROM VALUE #( ( %key-CpWfHandle      =    cl_system_uuid=>create_uuid_x16_static( )
                             %param-RetentionTime = wf_retention_days 
                             %param-PaWfDefId     = my_wf_defid ( id is correct)
                             %param-CallbackClass = callback_class
                             %param-Consumer      = consumer ) )
                MAPPED   DATA(mapped_wf)
                FAILED   DATA(failed_wf)
                REPORTED DATA(reported_wf).

         IF mapped_wf IS NOT INITIAL.

          "Map the fields to the outgoing context.
*          DATA(context)   = VALUE ty_wf_context(  ).

          " Set the workflow context for the new workflow instances
          TRY.
              DATA(lo_cpwf_api) = cl_swf_cpwf_api_factory_a4c=>get_api_instance( ).
              DATA(json_conv) = lo_cpwf_api->get_json_converter(  ).
              DATA(context_json) = json_conv->serialize( data = is_my)wf_context_context ).
            CATCH cx_swf_cpwf_api INTO DATA(lx_swf_api).
          ENDTRY.

*      *pass the Payload to workflow
           MODIFY ENTITIES OF i_cpwf_inst
            ENTITY CPWFInstance
            EXECUTE setPayload
            FROM VALUE #( ( %key-CpWfHandle = mapped_wf-cpwfinstance[ 1 ]-CpWfHandle
                           %param-context  = context_json ) )
                 MAPPED   mapped_wf
                 FAILED   failed_wf
                 REPORTED reported_wf ##NO_LOCAL_MODE.

          ENDIF.
         CATCH cx_uuid_error.

Communication Arrangment is SAP_COM_0863 is set up

When im creating the RAP method is called and i dont have errors/exceptions .  But the WF on Build automation is not created.

On Outbound Communitction i can see http 404 :

Probably im missing some configuration,

this path /public/workflow/rest/v1/workflow-instances , when i running the standalone template app on BTP i need to set also the  environmentId ->

/v1/workflow-instances?environmentId=myenvID  Should i set this somewhere on communication arrangment? 

any other possible issue on this configuration??

entry.title: Project financial and cost planning on S/4HANA Public Cloud.
entry.content:
Hello, dear gurus.
A company dedicated to constructing, renovating, and renting offices wants to implement S/4HANA Public Cloud. However, it needs to simulate predictive scenarios for changes in material costs and economic factors, such as inflation and tariffs, for both individual projects and portfolios. Does S/4HANA Public Cloud offer this functionality? If not, what additional solution would be most appropriate? SAC Planning? PAPM? Which tool is more feasible and simple to integrate and use with S/4HANA Public Cloud?

The company does not want to load the plan from Excel. Rather, they want a tool to plan which investments are appropriate and which are not.

@Luana_Lovison 

@Elton SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Finance

entry.title: Additional quantity in warehouse task for production staging
entry.content:
Hello Experts!

Our client is using EWM for production staging. Here is the process we have designed:

- From production order we initiate material staging

- Then from the app 'Process Posting Change Item' we create the warehouse task with destination as the production supply area.

- We confirm the warehouse task upon physically moving the components.

- We consume the components using backflushing (CO11N screen)

Now the ask from our client is - to add some buffer quantity when we are staging in case the line operator needs more. It is the nature of the production that they often need some extra quantity.

Now the problem is, system does not allow us to increase quantity in WT. Also, we cannot increase the quantity in BOM as it will force us to backflush the total quantity.

 Is there a way we can add some tolerance (like always have 10% extra quantity) to the Warehouse Task? Say, the production order needs 10 units, but in WT system proposes 11 units?

If you feel this could be addressed by a different process, let me know. I am open to ideas/leading practices.

Thank you

Snigdhodeep

EWM - Goods Movement #EWM - Production Staging #EWM - Warehouse Tasks

entry.title: Post Goods Movement - not authorized
entry.content:
Hello,

I am trying to use the Post Goods Movement app to close a Purchase Order. However, I get the error:

"You have no authorization for this transaction in plant 1000"

I have tried to add the roles described in the Fiori App Reference but it is still not working. What can I do to resolve this issue?

Thanks!

entry.title: Rollback scoping for Development Customizing Tenant
entry.content:
Hello All,

We have accidentally scoped incorrect scope items in CBC.

Could we understand if there is any rollback action?

We understand that once scope item is activated, it cannot be deactivate.

If reprovision system is the only way, could anyone share the process of reprovisioning the development customizing tenant and if possible to remain the same tenant URL?

Appreciate for your help.

Thank You.


Regards,

Chin Yee

entry.title: SAP S/4Hana public Cloud - APIs availability to programmatically retrieve Bank Accounts details
entry.content:
We are currently using 'Manage Bank Accounts' Fiori app to Read and Create Bank Account objects in SAP S/4Hana Public cloud.

In order develop an App for our partner needs, we need to programmatically retrieve and update Bank Account master data. We are exploring available APIs or customization options within SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud. Could you please advise if there are any supported approaches or services that facilitate this requirement?

entry.title: Assistance with Updating Outbound Delivery Multiple Item Lines (Custom Fields)
entry.content:
Good afternoon SAP Team,

I‚Äôm currently facing an issue and would appreciate your guidance. Could you please advise on how to update custom fields for multiple item lines in an Outbound Delivery?

The custom fields are triggered from specific events, but I believe my current approach may be incorrect.



For reference: In the example shown in the attached photo, each custom field is bound to a single property.

Additional Details:

Here‚Äôs the process flow I‚Äôm following:

  1. I create a Stock Transfer Order. using Stock Transfer Order API

  2. An Outbound Delivery is generated, which includes the custom fields.

  3. After creation, I attempt to update or modify the custom fields for each item line within the Outbound Delivery.

However, I‚Äôve noticed that only the first item line is successfully updated, while the subsequent item lines remain unchanged.

I suspect this may be related to how my current update logic is structured or how the payload is being handled

 

{
            "PurchaseOrderType": "UB",
            "CompanyCode": "BMII",
            "PurchasingOrganization": "MGPO",
            "PurchasingGroup": "001",
            "Supplier": "",
            "SupplyingPlant": "01BP",
            "YY1_Warehouse_Name_PDH": "Paranaque ",
            "_PurchaseOrderItem": [
                {
                    "PurchaseOrderItem": "10",
                    "Material": "A1",
                    "Plant": "02BP",
                    "OrderQuantity": 5.00,
                    "PurchaseOrderQuantityUnit": "PCE",
                    "NetPriceAmount": 0.00,
                    "DocumentCurrency": "PHP",
                    "YY1_OrderType_PDI": "0",
                    "YY1_Store_Name_PDI": "SM Megamall",
                    "YY1_DeliveryTypePO_PDI": "1D",
                    "YY1_Fan_Out_Category_PDI": "0",
                    "YY1_Item_Description_PDI": "1st Item",
                    "YY1_Order_Session_Id_PDI": "1st Session",
                    "YY1_Store_SubUnitPO1_PDI": "1",
                    "YY1_Item_Category_Name_PDI": "Cakes",
                    "YY1_MaterialVariantCod_PDI": "A27",
                    "PurchaseOrderItemCategory": "3",
                    "_PurchaseOrderItemNote": [
                        {
                            "TextObjectType": "F01",
                            "PlainLongText": "1st item"
                        },
                        {
                            "TextObjectType": "F03",
                            "PlainLongText": "1st Item Link Desc"
                        }
                    ]
                },
                {
                    "PurchaseOrderItem": "20",
                    "Material": "A1",
                    "Plant": "02BP",
                    "OrderQuantity": 10.00,
                    "PurchaseOrderQuantityUnit": "PCE",
                    "NetPriceAmount": 0.00,
                    "DocumentCurrency": "PHP",
                    "YY1_OrderType_PDI": "1",
                    "YY1_Store_Name_PDI": "SM Megamall",
                    "YY1_DeliveryTypePO_PDI": "1D",
                    "YY1_Fan_Out_Category_PDI": "0",
                    "YY1_Item_Description_PDI": "2nd Item",
                    "YY1_Order_Session_Id_PDI": "2nd Session",
                    "YY1_Store_SubUnitPO1_PDI": "2nd",
                    "YY1_Item_Category_Name_PDI": "2nd Cakes",
                    "YY1_MaterialVariantCod_PDI": "A1",
                    "PurchaseOrderItemCategory": "3",
                    "_PurchaseOrderItemNote": [
                        {
                            "TextObjectType": "F01",
                            "PlainLongText": "2nd Item Desc"
                        },
                        {
                            "TextObjectType": "F03",
                            "PlainLongText": "2nd Item Link"
                        }
                    ]
                }
            ]
        }

entry.title: Roles in Manage Workflows
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

When i try to create a Workflow for Purchase requisition there's an two options in Recipients 1.User, 2.Role.

1. When we select User approval will go for CB user ID.

2. There's another option called Role which has different characteristics and need to know what's Role and its Characteristics as you can see it in the image and use of it in Manage Workflows.

Best Regards,

Dinesh

entry.title: DEFAULT VALUES FOR GENERATION OF OPERATIONS CONFIGURATION SUPPORT
entry.content: We are facing the issue while creating production order with our material for rework order type with custom order type by using the app ‚Äúproduction order without material-create‚Äù.  Here we are facing the challenge that default values for generation of operation configuration is not available. As we are trying it is not available to add new entries.

entry.title: Wait Time not available in production order operations API
entry.content:
A minimum Wait Time is visible for each production order operation in SAP. This wait time is not available in any production order operation API endpoint (API_PRODUCTION_ORDER_2_SRV). Can this field be added to the endpoint, or is there an alternative endpoint?

I know the value is available via the routing endpoint (API_PRODUCTION_ROUTING;v=0003), but this endpoint returns the base value in the routing, not the actual value in the production order operation. If someone manually overrides the value, the value returned by the routing endpoint will not be correct.

entry.title: Packaging specification determination for pick-HUs in SAP Public Cloud WM
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I‚Äôm working with SAP Public Cloud WM and I‚Äôd like to clarify how packaging specifications are determined when creating a pick-HU for an outbound delivery.

From what I‚Äôve found in the documentation:

  • Packaging spec profiles like PB_EWM_GRP, PB_EWM_GRV, SPB_EWM_DEC, SPB_EWM_INB, and SPB_EWM_OUT exist but can‚Äôt be created or extended.

  • Packing with packaging specs seems possible in an outbound delivery using the ‚ÄúPack Handling Unit ‚Äì Advanced‚Äù app.

  • However, during RF picking, the system requires a manual entry of a packaging material to create a pick-HU (ad-hoc).

So my understanding is:
üëâ It‚Äôs not possible to determine packaging specifications for pick-HUs created during picking.

Is that correct? Has anyone managed to determine pick-HUs automatically based on packaging specs in SAP Public Cloud WM?

entry.title: Why does MRP change BOM of a rework production order with discontinued material?
entry.content:
Dear Community, 

We created a rework production order to rework a material 150A to 150B. The material 150A that is to be reworked has a successor entry 150B in the master data, please see screen copy2.

Example: Rework order 6001880 in the screen copy 1

Task: Take material 150A quantity 3 and produce 3 times material 150B from it

Discontinuation date material 150A: 02.07.2025

Creation of the rework order: 15.10.2025

It looks like SAP has changed the material and quantities in the rework order to use up exisiting 150A (as desired) and the successor 150B (does not make any sense).

At time of the release of the rework order, there were enough parts 150A in free stock. We assume that the system has changed the quantities automatically, as the free stock has been reduced in the meantime.

Now we wonder if this is a MRP problem or wrong settings in the master data. We can't check for every MRP run to see if the system makes changes to rework orders when free stock situation changes.

Anyideas on this behaviour? What must be changed to avoid this?

I apologize the screen copies are in German language only.

Thank you.

Regards,

Dirk

Regards

entry.title: #COE#RFL01- How to neutralize free Payment
entry.content:

Has anyone else done this configuration before?

I deleted the clearing account, but that doesn't completely block the free payments.

Thank you very much for your help. 

Best regards, 

Mouna

SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Finance 

FIN Accounts Receivable and Payable

entry.title: Alternate Reconciliation Account and¬†Overwriting control accounts initiated by MM through ERS
entry.content:
I would like to ask the expert advice regarding "Alternate Reconciliation Account and Overwriting Reconciliation Accounts initiated by MM through ERS" .
https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0e602d466b99490187fcbb30d1dc897c/0c67c30acde9468b9f1a43cae130a5a7.html?locale=en-US&version=LATESThttps://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0e602d466b99490187fcbb30d1dc897c/0c67c30acde9468b9f1a43cae130a5a7.html?locale=en-US

Query:
In SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud,it appears to be explained that the use of alternate reconciliation accounts for control accounts from ERS(F1683) is not possible. I would like to inquire about the following:

  1. Is there a BAdI or similar functionality that exists for modifying liability details automatically recorded from ERS?
  2. Is it possible to forcibly overwrite reconciliation accounts by using Open FI?
    I would appreciate any guidance you can provide on this topic.
    Thank you for your support & Kindly Regards,

Koji Mikami

P.S
I discovered and tested the BAdI (MRM_ERS_DATA_Modify_CE), but Reconciliation Accounts were not included in the Changing Parameters. If there are any other methods, please let me know. Also, is there a possibility that an Alternate Reconciliation Account could be used in the future from ERS?
https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0e602d466b99490187fcbb30d1dc897c/5a27c5f57c3f4dffa6881ca587b22571.html?locale=en-US&version=LATEST
